questions.question: Norse explorations as depicted in the image were least likely the result of which of the following?

choices.answer: Searches for access to existing trade networks
Migrations seeking new territories for settlement
Military ventures based on religious convictions

questions.question: Which of the following best reflects how Norse invaders most differed from those of other cultures in eighth century wes

choices.answer: Their ability to navigate both open waters and inland rivers
Their ruthless and brutal military tactics
The nomadic nature of the Scandinavian peoples
The inability of their forces to attack large cities

questions.question: Which of the following developments most strongly contributed to the ease with which Vikings and other invaders attacked

choices.answer: The weakness of the Frankish navy
The declining power of Frankish centralized authority
The lack of resources to maintain military forces
The internal power struggles among elite nobles

questions.question: Vikings and other invaders led most directly to which of the following developments in ninth century western Europe?

choices.answer: Kingdoms and the resurgence of imperial rule
Society based on independent regional states
